snippet.title: Captain Toad: Treasure Tracker - Overview Trailer (Nintendo Switch & Nintendo 3DS)
snippet.description:
Explore a variety of tricky sandbox-style levels in Captain Toad: Treasure Tracker, coming to Nintendo Switch and Nintendo 3DS on July 13th!

Try the free demo available now in Nintendo eShop!

#CaptainToad #NintendoSwitch #3DS

Download demo for Nintendo Switch: https://www.nintendo.co.uk/Games/Nintendo-Switch/Captain-Toad-Treasure-Tracker-1348071.html?utm_medium=social&utm_source=youtube&utm_campaign=CaptainToad%7Cw25

Download demo for Nintendo 3DS: https://www.nintendo.co.uk/Games/Nintendo-3DS/Captain-Toad-Treasure-Tracker-1348072.html?utm_medium=social&utm_source=youtube&utm_campaign=CaptainToad%7Cw25

Facebook Nintendo Switch: https://facebook.com/NintendoSwitch
Facebook Nintendo 3DS: https://facebook.com/Nintendo3DS
Facebook Super Mario: https://facebook.com/SuperMario
Twitter Nintendo UK: https://twitter.com/NintendoUK
Twitter Super Mario UK: https://twitter.com/SuperMario_UK
Instagram Nintendo UK: https://instagram.com/NintendoUK
Twitch Nintendo UK: https://twitch.tv/NintendoUK
YouTube Nintendo UK: https://bit.ly/2cREWfu
